models.name: todo_list_guests
models.description: Guest role information for unauthenticated users with limited read-only access. Represents basic guest identity records for access control and session tracking. Does not require a password or email, but includes timestamps and soft delete support.

plainFields.name: nickname
plainFields.description: Guest user's display nickname or pseudonym.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the guest record was soft deleted (nullable).

models.name: todo_list_users
models.description: Authenticated users of the Todo list application. Stores user credentials including unique email and hashed password for login. Maintains timestamps and soft delete timestamp for account lifecycle management.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Unique email address used for user login and communication.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user record was soft deleted (nullable).

models.name: todo_list_admins
models.description: System administrators with full permissions to manage users and system settings. Includes unique email and password hashing for secure access. Timestamps record lifecycle events and soft delete for account deactivation.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: Unique email address for admin login.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: Password hash for secure authentication of administrators.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin record was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin record was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the admin record was soft deleted (nullable).

models.name: todo_list_tasks
models.description: Represents individual todo tasks created and managed by authenticated users. Each task is linked to a user (todo_list_users) by foreign key todo_list_user_id. Tasks have a description text, a boolean completion status, and temporal fields for created, updated, and optional deleted (soft delete). The model supports a primary stance for independent user task management requiring CRUD operations.

plainFields.name: description
plainFields.description: Task description text, must be non-empty and trimmed.

plainFields.name: is_completed
plainFields.description: Indicates whether the task is completed (true) or pending (false).

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Soft delete timestamp, null if not deleted.
